src: "Nou gen kounya kèk sourit ki gen 4 mwa ki pa fè sik, men ki te fè l," li te ajoute.
mt: "We have some patients who have been here for four months who have not been sick, but who have been here," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Doktè Ehud Ur, pwofesè medsin nan inivèsite Dalhousie de Halifax, Nouvèl Ekòs ak prezidan divizyon klinik syantifik asosyasyon kanadyèn dyabèt, te avèti rechèch la toujou nan kòmansman l.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a clinical medicine professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's clinical science division, announced the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Kom plizyè lòt savan, li ensèten sou sijè ke maladi dyabèt ka geri, note ke rezilta sa pa gen okenn pètinans sou moun ki soufri dyabèt de tip 1.
mt: As with many other diseases, it is unclear whether diabetes can be cured, noting that the results do not have any bearing on people suffering from type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Lendi, Sara Danius, sekretè pèmanan Komite Nobèl Literati nan Akademin swedwaz la, te anonse an piblik nan yon emisyon radyo sou Sveriges Radio nan peyi Swèd komite a enkapab jwenn dirèkteman Bob Dylan sou sijè pri Nobèl literati 2016 la, te abandone efò yo pou jwenn li.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee, announced publicly on a radio broadcast on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee was unable to directly contact Bob Dylan on the subject of the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, abandoning their efforts to find him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius te di, "Nan moman sa menm, nou pa fè anyen. Mwen te rele epi voye imel ak pi pwòch kolaboratè l epi mwen te resevwa repons ki senpatik anpil. Pou kounya, sa san dout pa sifi."
mt: Danius said, "At this moment, we do nothing. I called and sent an email to the most important collaborators and I received a very sympathetic response. For now, this is not enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Oparavan, PDG Ring, Jamie Siminoff, te fè remake antrepriz la te demare lè sonèt pòt li an pat kapab tande depi nan magazen nan garaj li an.
mt: Oprah, CEO of Ring, Jamie Siminoff, made a pitch for the company's doorbell to go unheard from the store in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Li te konstwi yon sonèt pòt WiFi, li di.
mt: It was designed to be a portable WiFi hotspot, he said.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff te deklare vant yo te ogmante aprè aparisyon l an 2013 nan yon epizòd Shark Tank kote panèl seri a te refize finanse start up la.
mt: Siminoff declared that sales had increased after the product's appearance on the 2013 Shark Tank episode where the panel of the series had refused to finance the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Fen 2017, Siminoff parèt sou yon chèn televizyon komèsyal QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on a commercial television network QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring te regle tou yon pwosè avèk yon sosyete sekirite konkiran, ADT Corporation.
mt: The ring was also signed by a security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Si yon vaksen eksperimantal parèt kapab redwi mòtalite ki lye ak Ebola, jiska prezan, okenn medikaman pat klèman demontre tankou l adapte ak enfeksyon ki egziste a.
mt: If an experimental vaccine appeared able to reduce mortality associated with Ebola, until now, no medication has proven to adapt to the existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Yon kòktèl antikò, ZMapp te dabò revele pwometè sou teren an, men etid fòmèl yo te endike li te prezante mwens avantaj pase sa ki te rechèch yo nan prevansyon lanmò yo.
mt: A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, was also revealed to have been tested on soil, but formal studies indicated it presented fewer advantages than those being researched in death prevention.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Nan esè PALM nan, ZMapp te sèvi kòm temwen, kidonk syantifik yo itilise li kòm baz done epi konpare twa lòt yo avèl.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, so scientists used it as a baseline and compared it to three others available.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics ap sipòte lèt komite olenmpik Etazini an epi aksepte nesesite total fanmi olenmpik la pou pwomouvwa yon anviwònman sekiritè pou tout atlèt nou yo.
mt: USA Gymnastics is supporting a letter from the U.S. Olympic Committee and accepting the total need of the Olympic family to promote a secure environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Nou dakò avèk deklarasyon USOC la selon li enterè atlèt nou yo ak klèb nou yo, epi espò yo, kapab pi byen sèvi ale an avan avèk chanjman siyifikatif yo anndan òganizasyon nou an, pito avèk desètifikasyon an.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that our athletes and clubs, and sports, can better serve the country ahead of significant changes within our organization, rather than with decertification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics ap sipòte yon ankèt endepandan ki ta kapab fè limyè sou fason kote abi kondisyon an dekri avèk anpil kouraj pa reskape yo Larry Nassar pat kapab pase inapèsi pandan lontan epi adopte tout chanjman nesesè ak apwopriye.
mt: USA Gymnastics is supporting an independent investigation that could determine how the abuse described with great courage by the survivors Larry Nassar was able to go on for so long and adopt all necessary changes and appropriate.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics ak USOC a gen menm objektif — rann espò jimnastik lan, ak lòt yo, pi sekiritè posib pou atlèt yo kapab pouswiv rèv yo nan yon anviwònman sekiritè, pozifif ak otonòm.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal — to advance the sport of gymnastics, and others, in a safe, positive, and autonomous environment for athletes to pursue their dreams.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Pandan tout lane 1960 yo, Brzezinski te travay pou John F. Kennedy antanke konseye, epi pou administrasyon Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as an adviser, and for the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Lè seleksyon 1976 yo, li te konseye Carter nan kesyon politik etranjè, epi te konseye sekirite nasyonal (NSA) ant 1977 ak 1981, ranplasan Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 selection, he advised Carter on foreign policy issues, and advised the National Security Agency (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Antan ke NSA, li te ede Carter jere diplomatikman zafè lemond, tankou akò Kam David, 1978; nòmalizasyon relasyon ant Etazini ak Lachin nan fen lane 1970; Revolisyon Iranyèn ki debouche sou kriz otaj nan Iran, 1979; ak envazyon Sovyetik la nan Afganistan, 1979.
mt: Before the NSA, it helped Carter diplomatically resolve world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalization of relations between the United States and China in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution which led to the hostage crisis in Iran, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Fim avèk Ryan Gosling epi Emma Stone te resevwa nominasyon nan tout gwo kategori yo.
mt: The film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling ak Stone te nome yo chak meyè aktè ak meyè aktris.
mt: Gosling and Stone were named each best male actor and best female actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Lòt nominasyon yo gen ladan yo meyè fim, reyalizatè, sinematografi, konsepsyon kostim yo, montaj, mizik orijinal, konsepsyon pwodiksyon an, montaj son, miksaj son ak senaryo orijinal.
mt: Other nominations include best film, director, cinematography, costume design, editing, original music, production design, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: De chanson fim Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ak City of Stars, te nomine pou meyè chanson orijinal. Estidyo Lionsgate te resevwa 26 nominasyon — plis pase tout lòt estidyo.
mt: 2 songs from the film Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Dimanch apremidi, Prezidan Etazini an Donald Trump, nan yon deklarasyon ki te fèt atravè sekretè pou la près, te anonse twoup ameriken yo ta pral kite peyi Siri.
mt: On Sunday afternoon, President of the United States Donald Trump, in a statement made through his press secretary, announced that American troops will leave Saudi Arabia.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Anons sa a te fèt apre Trump te fin gen yon konvèsasyon nan telefòn ak Prezidan Tik Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: This announcement was made after Trump had finished a phone conversation with President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Tiki te pran tou an chaj siveyans konbatan ISIS prizonye yo kote nasyon ewopeyèn yo te refize rapatriye yo, selon deklarasyon an.
mt: 1000s of ISIS prisoners have been taken to secret Syrian prisons where European nations have refused to repatriate them, according to a statement.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Sa konfime pa sèlman omwen kèk dinozò te gen plim, yon teyori ki deja gaye anpil, men bay detay fosil yo pa kapab jeneralman bay, tankou koulè ak dispozisyon tridimansyonèl.
mt: This confirms not only that some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that has been widely accepted, but also provides details of the fossils, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Syantifik yo di plimaj animal sa te mawon chaten sou anlè epi koulè pal oswa kawotenoyid sou anba.
mt: Scientists say the animals were infected with rabies and either licked or scratched the boy.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Dekouvèt sa pèmèt tou pou pi byen konprann evolisyon plim yo lakay zwazo yo.
mt: The discovery also allows better understanding of the evolution of plumes in the nests of birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Kòm plim dinozò yo pa gen yon tij byen devlope, ki  rele rachi, men yo gen lòt karakteristik plim — bab ak babil — chèchè yo dedwi ke rachi a te pwobableman yon devlòpman evolitif ki vini apre lòt karakteristik yo.
mt: Because the dinosaur's neck was not well developed, which is called the rachis, but it has other characteristics of the plume — the head and tail — researchers deduce that the rachis was probably an evolutionary development that came after other characteristics.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Estrikti plim yo sijere yo pat itilize an vòl men pito pou regilasyon oswa afichaj tanperati. Chèchè yo te sijere menm si li se ke yon jèn dinozò, echantiyon an montre plimaj granmoun lan epi pa plimaj yon jèn.
mt: The instructions call for the use of the plunger, but not for regulation or temperature marking. The researchers were surprised that it was a young dinosaur, the samples showed that the adults were larger and not a young one.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Chèchè yo te sijere, menm si li fè pati ke yon jèn dinozò, echantiyon a montre yon plimaj granmoun epi pa yon plimaj yon jèn.
mt: The researchers were surprised, even if they had expected a young dinosaur, the sample showed a large adult and not a large young.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Esplozyon yon machin nan katye jeneral lapolis nan Gazyanntèp, Latiki yè maten, te touye de ofisye polis epi blese plis pase ven lòt moun.
mt: An explosion in a police station in Gyanntep, Latakia, in the morning, killed two police officers and injured more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Biwo gouvènè te deklare disnèf nan blese yo se te ofisye polis.
mt: The governor's office declared a state of emergency in the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Komisè polis Chandra Shekhar Solanki te deklare akize yo te parèt nan tribinal la avèk vizaj yo kouvri.
mt: Commissioner of Police Chandra Shekhar Solanki declared the charges appeared in the court with the faces covered.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Yo te konstate Solèy la t ap fonksyone selon menm prensip de baz lòt zetwal yo: Aktivite tout zetwal sistèm lan detèmine pa limyozite yo, wotasyon yo epi anyen ankò.
mt: It was found that the Sun is not functioning according to the same basic principles of other electrical systems: the activity of the entire electrical system is determined by the resistance of the wires, the capacitance and anything else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Yo utLimyozite ak wotasyon itilize ansanm pou detèmine kantite Rossby yon etwal, ki lye ak mouvman plasma a.
mt: They use ultralight and voting together to determine the amount of Rossby an equator, which is related to the movement of plasma.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Plis kantite Rossby a piti, mwens etwal la aktif nan sa ki konsène envèsman mayetik yo.
mt: More Rossby waves, shorter, less equatorially active in what concerns magnetic inversions.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Pandan vwayaj li, lwasaki te gen plizyè pwoblèm.
mt: During the flight, the aircraft had several problems.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Pirat te vòlè bagay li, yon chen anraje te atake li nan Tibè, li te sove pou l pa te marye nan peyi Nepal epi yo te arete li an End.
mt: The bandit stole his things, a bear attacked him in Tibet, he was saved because he had not married in Nepal and they arrested him in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Estanda a 802,11n opere sou tou de frekans yo 2,4Ghz ak 5,0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Sa pral pèmèt li retwokonpatib avèk règ 802.11a, 802.11b ak 802.11g, ak kondisyon estasyon de baz la dispoze de radyo.
mt: 802.11n will allow it to be interoperable with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, and the condition that the base station has a radio.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Vitès yo se 802.11n yo siperyè anpil ak pa predesesè yo a, avèk yon randman teyorik maksimal 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are much higher than its predecessors, with a theoretical maximum of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, ki marye epi gen de gran timoun, pa kite yon gwo enpresyon sou Miller, moun avèl istwa a lye.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two grown children, did not leave a deep impression on Miller, who is the subject of the book.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Lè nou te mande l kòmante, Miller te deklare, "Mike pale anpil pandan odisyon an...Mwen t ap prepare m kidonk mwen pat vrèman tande sa li t ap di."
mt: When we asked him how he felt, Miller declared, "Mike talked a lot during the ordeal...I was preparing myself so I didn't really hear what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "N ap efòse nou pou redwi emisyon di oksid kabòn pa inite PIB yon mannyè notab apati 2020 parapò ak nivo 2005 lan," Hu te deklare.
mt: "We are working to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable amount by 2020 compared to the 2005 level," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Li pat fikse chif pou rediksyon yo, di sa yo pral fèt sou baz pwodiksyon ekonomik Lachin.
mt: It did not fix the number of redemptions, saying they will be based on economic production basis of China.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu te ankouraje peyi an devlopman yo "pou evite ansyen wout ki vle nou polye dabò epi nou netwaye aprè."
mt: Hu urged developing countries "to avoid old paths we want to pave again and clean up after."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Li te ajoute "yo pat dwe sepandan mande yo asime obligasyon yo ki depase estad devlopman yo, responsabilite yo ak kapasite yo."
mt: It added: "They should not be allowed to shirk their obligations, which exceed their state's development, responsibilities and capabilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Gwoup etid sou Irak la te prezante rapò li an jodi a ak 12.00 GMT.
mt: A group of researchers in Iraq presented its report today at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Li prevwa ke pyès moun pa ka garanti ke yon aksyon an Irak nan stad sa ka fè gè sivil la sispann, oubyen vyolans ak kawo kap devolope a.
mt: It is not guaranteed that an action in Iraq in this state can stop the civil war, or violence and the development of chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Rapò a louvri sou yon deba piblik epi kreyasyon yon akò nan peyi Etazini sou politik sou sijè Mwayen Oryan an.
mt: The report opened on a public debate and the creation of an agreement in the United States on the issue of Middle Eastern policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Rapò a kritik anpil sou sijè prèske tout aspè politik aktyèl ekzekitif la konsènan Irak epi mande avèk ensistans yon chanjman direksyon rapid.
mt: The report criticized almost all aspects of the current executive's policy concerning Iraq and demanded with insistence a rapid change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Premye pami 78 rekòmandasyon l yo se yon nouvèl inisyativ diplomatik ki dwe pran avan fen lane sa pou sekirize fwontyè Irak yo kont entèvansyon ènmi yo epi pou retabli relasyon diplomatik yo avèk vwazen l yo.
mt: 1 of the 78 recommendations is a new diplomatic initiative that should be taken before the end of the year to secure Iraq's frontiers against enemy intervention and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Aktyèl senatris epi premyè dam ajantin lan Fernandez de Kirchner te anonse kandidati l pou prezidan yèswa nan La Plata, yon vil ki sitiye ak 50 kilomèt (31 miles) Buenos Aires.
mt: Current Argentine senator and first lady Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president in La Plata, a city located 50 kilometres (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Madame Kirchner fè pa entansyon poul poze kandidati pou prezidan teyat an Ajantin, Menm kote an 2005 li te kòmanse kanpay pou sena kòm manm delegasyon pwovens bweno zè.
mt: Madame Kirchner has no intention of running for president of the Argentine theater, where in 2005 she began campaigning as a member of the good province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Deba a te pwovoke pa dezakò sou depans pou èd ak rekonstriksyon apre Ouragan Katrina a; ke kèk konsèvatè nan zafè taks te bay ti non " Nouvo Akò New Orleans Bush la", pou fè moun ri.
mt: The cuts were prompted by the cost of the reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina; some tax conservators gave the project a nickname "New Orleans Bush's New Deal", to make people laugh.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: kritik liberal efò rekonstriksyon an te baze sou atribisyon kontra rekonstriksyon pou yon gwoup inisye washinntonn.
mt: Liberal critics of the reconstruction effort were based on the attribution of reconstruction to a group of Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Plis pase kat milyon moun rann yo nan Wòm pou asiste antèman an.
mt: 4 million people are expected to attend the event in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Kantite moun ki prezan yo te enpòtan anpil li pat posib pou tout moun gen aksè ak antèman an sou plas Sen Pyè.
mt: The number of people present was so large that it was impossible for everyone to have access to the place of the incident on the Sen Pye.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Plizyè gwo ekran televizyon te enstale nan diferan kote nan Wòm pou pèmèt moun yo gade seremoni an.
mt: Several large screen televisions were installed in different places in Bangkok to allow people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Nan anpil vil Itali ak nan rès mond la, patikilyèman nan Polòy, te gen enstalasyon konsa ki te fèt e gen anpil moun ki te vizite yo.
mt: In many Italian towns and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland, there were such installations that were made and many people visited them.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Istoryen yo kritike politik FBI tap itilize nan ane pase yo paske yo te konn itilize resous yo sou bagay ki te fasil pou jwenn solisyon yo, espesyalman tankou vol machin, avek entansyon pou monte byen wo kantite rezilta ajans lan bay.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's use of tactics in past years because they knew how to use their resources on things that were easily solved, especially aircraft hijackings, with the intention of increasing the number of results the agency provided.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongrè a te kòmanse finanse inisyativ sou salte pandan egzèsis 2005 lan epi presize FBI dwe konsakre 10 ajan nan pònografi pou granmoun.
mt: The Congress began to finance the initiative on salt during the 2005 exercise and the FBI must commit 10 agents to pornography for adults.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa te reyalize pi bon eskò manch lan, 70 runs an sèlman 41 balls an pandan li t ap frape 11 kat epi 2 sis.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the best innings of the match, 70 runs off 41 balls while he was striking 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Baton mwayen lòd, Sachin Tendoulkar ak Rahul Dravid, te byen pefome epi yo te fè yon santen patenarya.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and put on a 150-run partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Men, aprè kapitèn nan pèdi wicket li, Lend fè 36 desant kote li pèdi 7 wicket pou fini manch la.
mt: However, after the captain lost his wicket, Lend made 36 runs where he lost 7 wickets to finish the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Prezidan ameriken an George W. Bush te rive nan Singapour maten 16 novanm lan kòmanse yon toune k ap dire yon semèn an Azi.
mt: 16 November 2005: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore this morning to begin a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Se vis Premye Minis Sengapou a Wong Kan Seng, ki te resevwa li epi yo te pale sou koze komes ak pwoblem teworis avek Premye Minis Sengapou a Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: It was received by Prime Minister of Singapore Lee Hsien Loong, who discussed matters of commerce and terrorism with Prime Minister of Singapore Wong Kan Seng.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Apre li fin fè yon semèn ap pèdi nan yon eleksyon mi-manda a, Bouch pale odyans la sou ekspansyon komès la nan Lazi.
mt: After finishing a week-long campaign for a mid-term election, Bouch spoke on the expansion of commerce in the Lazi.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Premye Minis Stephen Harper te aksepte voye 'Lwa sou Kalite Lè a' gouvènman an bay yon komite plizyè pati pou analiz, avan dezyèm lekti li an, aprè reyinyon 25 minit lan madi avèk chèf NDP a, Jack Layton nan PMO a.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper accepted to send the 'Quality of Life Act' to a committee of several parties for analysis, before a second reading of it, after a 25-minute meeting on Monday with NDP leader Jack Layton in the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Leyton te mande chanjman nan pwojè lwa sou anviwonman pandan rankont ak premye minis la, li mande yon "reekriti konplè e apwofondi" de pwojè lwa anviwonmanal pati konsevatè an.
mt: Leyton called for changes to the environmental bill during a meeting with the prime minister, asking for a "complete re-write and reduction" of the environmental bill part of the conservation act.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Depi gouvènman federal la entèvni pou pran an chaj finansman lopital Mersey nan Devonport, nan Tasmanie, gouvènman Leta ak kèk depite federal yo te kritike zak sa tankou yon kout zeklè an previzyon ak eleksyon federal yo ki dwe konvoke nan mwa novanm.
mt: Since the federal government intervened to take over the management of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised the move as a pre-election stunt and a waste of money.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Men Premye Minis John Howard te deklare lwa sa te selman le evite enstalasyon lopital yo pa deklase pa gouvènman Tasmani an, pandan l ap bay 45 milyon dola ostralyen anplis.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard declared the law was only to prevent the installation of hospitals being declared by the Tasmanian government, while it was giving away 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Dapre dènye bilten an, relve nivo lanmè yo endike yon tsounami te kreye. Gen kèk aktivite tsounami ki anrejistre tou pre Pago Pago ak Niye.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level gauges indicate a tsunami was created. There are some tsunami activity recorded prior to Pago Pago and Nii.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Okenn dega oswa blese enpòtan pat siyale nan Tongo, men kouran an te koupe pandan yon ti tan, sa ki ta pral anpeche otorite tongàn yo resevwa alèt tsunami an ki te difize pa PTWC.
mt: No deaths or serious injuries were reported in Tonga, but the current was cut off for a short time, which would prevent Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Katòz lekòl Hawaii sitiye sou oswa prè kot yo te fèmen tout mèkredi malgre avètisman yo te retire.
mt: 3 Hawaii schools located on or near the coast were closed all Thursday despite assurances they were safe.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Prezidan ameriken an George W. Bush te felisite pou anons sa.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush congratulated the team on the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Pòt pawòl Bush la, Gordon Johndroe kalifye pwomès Kore Di Nò "de etap majè, nan objektif denikleyarizasyon ke yo ka verifye sou penensil koreyen an."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe qualified the North Korean promise to "take two steps back, in the objective of de-nuclearization that can be verified on the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Dizyèm tanpèt la nome sezon ouragan Atlantik lan, tanpèt sibtwopikal Jerry, te fòme nan oseyan Atlantik lan jodi a.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: National Hurricane Center (NHC) afime nan estad sa, Jerry pa reprezante okenn menas pou tè yo.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) states that Jerry does not pose any threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Kò di jeni ameriken te estime 6 pous lapli ta kapab kraze ansyen dig ki detwi yo.
mt: 6 inches of American snow was estimated to have crushed old trees that were felled.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: The Ninth Ward, ki konnen inondasyon yo atenn 20 pye de wo pandan ouragan Katrina, se aktyèlman nan dlo jous nan gwosè l paske dig vwazen a te debòde.
mt: The Ninth Ward, which saw floodwaters reach 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently underwater in a gully because a neighbor's levee was breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Dlo a ap devèse sou dig la nan yon seksyon 100 pye lajè a.
mt: 100 feet of pipe is leaking water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Administratè Komin yo, Adam Cuerden, te montre fistrasyon l konsènan eliminasyon yo lè l t ap adrese l ak Wikinews mwa pase a.
mt: The city's administrator, Adam Cuerden, expressed frustration with the eliminations when he addressed Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Li [Peyi Gal] nou te fè manti depi nan kòmansman. Premyèman,li aji tankou si sete pou rezon jiridik yo. Dezyèman, pretann li t ap koute nou, jiska sipresyon la a."
mt: "It [the Galapagos Islands] we have been waiting for since the beginning. First, it seemed like it was just a matter of legalities. Second, it was taking too long to hear from them, until the final decision."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Iritasyon mkominote a te kondwui ak efò aktyèl yo ki vize pou elabore yon politik konsènankontni seksyèl pou sit ki ebèje milyon medya sous lisan ki louvri.
mt: The community was irritated with the current efforts to target the development of a sexual policy for sites that have millions of media under the open license.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Travay ki fèt la te sitou teyorik, men pwogram lan te ekri pou teste obsèvasyon ki fèt yo sou galaksi Sajitè a.
mt: The work was largely theoretical, but the program was written to test observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Efè ekip la te rechèche a ta koze pa fòs mare yo ant matyè nwa galaksi an ak matyè nwa Vwa lakte a.
mt: The team's findings suggest that the force of the collision between the Milky Way galaxy and the Large Magellanic Cloud may have caused the Magellanic Stream.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Menmjan lalin egzèse yon fòs sou latè, sa ki pwovoke mare, vwa lakte a egzèse yon fòs sou galaksi sajitè.
mt: The same force that causes tides on Earth, which is caused by the moon's force on the galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Syantifik yo pa kapab konkli matyè nwa a afekte lòt matyè nwa yo nan menm fason ak matyè òdinè a.
mt: Scientists are unable to conclude that the black matter affects other black matters in the same way as the ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Selon teyori sa, majè pati matyè nwa ozalantou yon galaksi twouve yo nan yon fòm halo, epi konstitiye yon gwo kantite ti patikil.
mt: According to theory, matter in a black hole is thought to be found in a form of halo, and to constitute a large amount of subatomic particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Rapò televizyon montre lafimen blan ki soti nan plant la.
mt: A television report shows a white cloud rising from the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Otorite lokal yo avèti rezidan yo nan vwazinaj la pou rete anndan ak klimatizè yo etenn e pou yo pa bwè dlo nan tiyo an.
mt: Local authorities advised residents in the area to stay indoors with air conditioning and not to drink water from the tap.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Selon ajans nikleyè Japon an, yo te idantifye sezyòm ak yòd radyoaktif nan izin lan.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, they have identified cesium and iodine radioactivity in the soil.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Otorite yo sipoze ke sa demontre ke kontenè yo ki genyen gaz iranyòm sou sit la ta sanble andomage epi ta gen fwit ladan.
mt: Authorities suspect that the contents of the container, which had been found to contain flammable gas, had been tampered with and had exploded.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Doktè Tony Moll te dekouvri Tibèkiloz ki Rezistan Anpil ak Medikaman  (XDR-TB) nan rejyon sid afrikèn KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Nan yon ti bat bouch, li te deklare nouvo varyan an "twoublan anpil epi enkyetan pou rezon to moun k ap mouri yo elve anpil."
mt: In a brief statement, he declared the new variant "very worrying and concerning because of the number of people dying."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Kèk pasyan ta kapab gen viris la nan lopital la, panse Dr. Moll, epi pou pi piti de nan yo te travayè sanitè lopital la.
mt: Some patients may have been infected in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and some of them were hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
